channel.title: Adding holy books?
channel.description: I made a quest on my server that gives you a damaged book. Problem is, I have no idea to make it require all 4 different pages of that book to turn into a holy book. I'm thinking this would have to do with public int's? Or am I wrong. Anyways thanks to anyone who helps.

item.title: Adding holy books?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

I made a quest on my server that gives you a damaged book. Problem is, I have no idea to make it require all 4 different pages of that book to turn into a holy book. I’m thinking this would have to do with public int’s? Or am I wrong. Anyways thanks to anyone who helps.
